name: Zoho Show Shortcut
summary: A ZSHOW file is a shortcut used to open a Zoho Show presentation. It was created by Zoho Docs Sync, Zoho WorkDrive Sync, or Zoho WorkDrive True Sync, when a user synced their cloud Zoho files to their PC. ZSHOW files contain only a shortcut to a presentation; they do not contain the presentation itself.
